website_summaries.verdict: If you spend a lot of time outdoors and need a pair of sandals to fit your lifestyle, these KEENs are for you. However, other styles we considered are better for hiking in rough terrain.
pros: Ideal for women who want a tough, airy shoe thanks to the sandal style paired with sturdy materials ideal for outdoor wear
Polyester construction with bungee lacing creates a comfortable, flexible fit on most feet
cons: Not the best choice for wet surfaces or inclines, as the soles don't have great traction
Some had difficulties finding correct sizes

website_summaries.verdict: Though they aren't without issues, they are by far the best choice for women who want a pair of sandals that can be worn outdoors in various conditions.
pros: Provides a blend of good looks and tough features that make them ideal for outdoor wear – waterproof materials, thick foot bed cushioning, and lug pattern rubber soles
cons: Some reported sizing problems – may fit too large or small depending on foot structure
The arch support could be better
Stitching occasionally unravels in areas, and material may loose elasticity over time

customer_reviews.title: I've bought and worn the Venice before. Thought I'd ...
customer_reviews.text: I've bought and worn the Venice before. Thought I'd try something new for a change. Arrived today. I bought the same size I use in the Venice...these Whispers are too tight. A fatal flaw for me is that the plastic toe comes up to cover my big toe and ends right at the place my toe nail begins. As a result, it keeps catching my toe nail and trying to turn it back. Ugh... I've got to send them back for a new Venice. I know they work.
customer_reviews.author: Fiddlesticks!

customer_reviews.title: Good style - not as chunky and masculine-looking
customer_reviews.text: These are definitely better made than the Hi-Tec water sandals I had to give away b/c they rubbed my toes. These are worth the extra $21. They are a little hard to get on at first. They have no arch support or cushioning so I inserted my Powerstep insole with Velcro to keep it in place. I wish I could find a similar sandal with some arch support. Edit 10/15/18: I noticed that I had trouble tightening my right shoe. Come to find out, the adjustment strap near the exterior ankle area(see red oval) was sewn down. I took a seam ripper to remove a few stitches and it now adjusts properly.
customer_reviews.author: Cognizant Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Great for adventurous travel
customer_reviews.text: I needed a good pair of waterproof, hiking sandals for a hour-long trip to Scotland this summer. I was going to buy a different brans, when my sister recommended these. She said she wore them through her entire 2 week service trip to Costa Rica, so I checked them out. They were perfect! I was able to comfortably walk miles on pavement in the cities, climb wet rocks, walk in the beaches and go into the water with them, and even climb up and down hills covered in water without slipping. And now that I'm home, I can even wear them when I kayak!
customer_reviews.author: Koppur

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable sandal ever!
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable sandals I have ever owned. I have a very narrow foot and was hesitant to order a shoe in a medium width. After reading reviews from other narrow-footed people, I decided to take a chance. I wore the sandals from early morning until late evening the very first time, and my feet still felt great. The color,blue coral/Baltic, is true to its picture. I will definitely get my money's worth out of these sandals.
customer_reviews.author: Kay H.

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware! Don't make the same mistake I did!
customer_reviews.text: DON'T BUY THESE! They are cheaply made after only a month and wearing them less than 5 times, (5 days outside the return time frame of course) they are falling apart, the stitching is coming out of them. They are the worst quality Keens I have ever purchased and I wish I hadn't bought them. I even tried to contact Amazon to see about a replacement pair but I can't get a response. I'm completely disappointed in Amazon and with the product! Save your $80 and buy something else!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Burke

customer_reviews.title: Out of this world fantastic for all kinds of sports!
customer_reviews.text: WOWZA!! I just receive these and put them on... I had to stop immediately to write a review! These are out of this fantastic for all kinds of sports! And the width is even adjustable! Yes , they actually do fit true to size. I would highly recommend this product and I definitely gave it five stars. I'll probably even purchase a few more similar styles for my sporty lifestyle down in the lower Keys of Florida. Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Poe & Dro

customer_reviews.title: 11.5 would fit perfect, but I'm just happy to find a size 12
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because it was one of the few styles available in size 12. It fits nicely and is very comfortable. The toe box is very big, but I haven't had a problem with stubbing it on things. I suspect an 11.5 would fit me perfectly, but such a thing does not seem to exist. (I tried a size 11 but couldn't even get it on due to the narrow opening.) Even so, the shoe doesn't look overly large, and has held up well in the two months (ish) that I've been wearing it around town.
customer_reviews.author: maggieb

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, but stay wet.
customer_reviews.text: I read thru numerous reviews and looked at several versions of Keen sandals for women before deciding on this pair. I bought an 8 and they fit like my normal size, they are actually more comfortable than I expected in terms of the stretchiness of the straps. I do get rocks in them sometimes which is annoying but they have been comfortable hiking and wearing to a theme park all day. My biggest dislike is that they take over a day to dry out, I got them so that I could go thru rivers and such but than hate the wet feeling all day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these sandals
customer_reviews.text: Love these sandals! Fit is true to size (size 9 for me) and were comfortable right out of the box. Pretty color too. (I got sterling blue.) I work in a school building without air conditioning. These are a perfect choice for work. Casual but nice. My feet can breathe, but my toes aren't hanging out. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Persephone

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but not for hiking uphill
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are fairly comfortable but as mentioned elsewhere not particularly rugged. The main issue I had was that the back strap is fairly flimsy and my feet slip out when hiking uphill. My toes are an inch back and my heals hang out the shoe. Pulling the cord tight helps; but the back strap is a thin elastic material so tore within a few months. They would be great for hiking on a flat surface but not rugged enough for real hiking.
customer_reviews.author: Sasafracas

customer_reviews.title: Too small and narrow in my regular size
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 8 in almost every kind of shoe, except I size up to a 9 in athletic shoes. I suppose that's what I should have done with these. These were way too short and they were too narrow also. I felt like my feet were squeezed into them, so I am not sure longer would help. I don't have particularly "fat" feet. I loved the look of the shoes. I may try Keens in another size.
customer_reviews.author: Double_El

customer_reviews.title: Keen water shoe vs. Merrell water shoe
customer_reviews.text: I prefer Keen over Merrell for this type shoe. I wanted a sandal to be able to use for working around my farm. Merrell beats Keen on hiking shoes, but this Keen water shoe is great....I returned the Merrell. If it had arch support it would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Angela in SC

customer_reviews.title: Why do I even try Keen’s anymore?  Hot and not adjustable.
customer_reviews.text: Every few years, I waste my time and money to try KEEN shoes because so many people seem to think they are great. They continue to be HOT, and I live in the cool Pacific Northwest. In addition, the laces are purely cosmetic if the front half of the shoe doesn’t fit. You can’t really loosen them beyond the existing straps to customize them for your feet. They are rugged, so I am giving them two stars instead of one, but now I have to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Twiggy

customer_reviews.title: I'm so excited to finally have a pair. Been wanting these forever.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable for walking, sight seeing, hiking, or wearing as water shoes to protect your toes and feet from sharp objects in the water. Dries quickly. Did not rub blisters either. Spent the whole day at the National Zoo with no problems. Stays secure to help with escalators and steps. Love these so much!
customer_reviews.author: PurpleSnow

customer_reviews.title: The shoe was too narrow for my foot though the heel was fine as I have a narrow heel
customer_reviews.text: Had to return these. The arch support didn't actually fit where my arch is but slightly toward the heel so was extremely uncomfortable, providing zero support. The shoe was too narrow for my foot though the heel was fine as I have a narrow heel. The sole was rock hard. Not that easy to get on and off as the heel didn't have a velcro strap. Exchanged for Ecco Biom Delta Offroad sandal -- the Ecco sandals are perfect, very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: wren

customer_reviews.title: A Great shoe for Travel
customer_reviews.text: Before traveling to Italy I purchased these from Amazon because local stores did not carry my size. The fit & support was & remains great. At 78 years of age I walked, walked, walked in Italy with no problem. I have received many compliments on the style & look of the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: NC Gal

customer_reviews.title: Fit Guide Works!
customer_reviews.text: I used the "Fit Guide" and answered the questions then ordered the size it suggested even though it seemed large. I wear a 9 and it suggested size 10. The sandals fit perfectly! I just ordered a 2nd pair in a different color. My husband loved the way they look and my comfort, so he ordered a men's pair. The company even sent a return package for easy returns. I have a hard time finding footwear that is comfortable. These are GREAT!
customer_reviews.author: Kerry

customer_reviews.title: NOT as expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought the wisper after reading the reviews and loving my newports. I wanted one that was a little less heavy and lighter color for the summer.. The whisper came and I was so dissappointed as the arch support is nothing like the newports or my keen hiking shoes and so the fit was strange for me. I loved the beautiful blue and grey color and even bought arch supporters to put in them but they just did not work out.. Need to try another style and hope they are better.
customer_reviews.author: barb

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and comfort
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprised to find these shoes so comfortable, I have a broad foot, always get blisters and struggle to find shoes. These shoes met all the criteria. I went on a 3.5 days whitewater rafting, camping and strenuous hiking trip, not even once did I get a blister, they were comfortable and very stable!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah-Marie Whitehead

customer_reviews.title: Keen Does It Again
customer_reviews.text: I've been a fan of Keen shoes & sandals for years, wearing them all year around for general wear and hiking. I've worn out a couple of their Voyager hiking shoes, and just get a new pair every so often. I have a pair of Keen Newport H2O sandals which I think must be 1/2 size too large. I've worn 'em for years, but ... the new ones I just got, size 10, fit perfectly. They feel great. Also, these shoes & sandals wear very well. They also wash well - just pop 'em in the wash & they're good to go. I'm looking forward to many happy years - and very happy feet! - for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Prince

customer_reviews.title: Very nice shoe
customer_reviews.text: Fit well, looks good. One thing I might mention is that the color is lighter than it appears. The shade is more of a pink, hard to describe, maybe a soft muted burgundy, is what it looks like to me. Not what I expected, that would be the only point that I would caution on. I had a pair several years ago that we're a deeper shade and thought that it might be the same, but I kept them anyway. ps original review was on the "barberry" (red) color; the picture appearing with my review seems to be of a gray colored shoe, so I hope this doesn't sound goofy or confusing, still a great shoe and good price
customer_reviews.author: islandgirl

customer_reviews.title: Does not match up with size chart measurements
customer_reviews.text: I typically am a size 6, so after measuring my feet and comparing the measurement to the size chart, that is what I ordered. The shoes were way too wide and about a size too big! All reviews I have seen say they run small and are narrow. I was going to return for a smaller size but found that all of the smaller sizes are unavailable. I’m disappointed with this product overall as the size is drastically different than what the sizing chart stated.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha

customer_reviews.title: Liked them except for chemical smell
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and nice color, but they came with a chemical smell which stunk up the room in the house where I had them, so I moved them to the garage for a couple of weeks and they still have that strong chemical smell, so sending them back.
customer_reviews.author: my2cents

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sandal!
customer_reviews.text: I live on a horse ranch so the fact that these are washable was extremely appealing. I ordered my regular size (I go up in Keen boots) and the fit was perfect. Liked them so much that I ordered 2 more pair - because they do not dry as quickly as I need plus they come in so many lovely colors! The longer than expected drying time was the only drawback. The offset toe cover seemed a little odd at first but works well for kicking my ATV into gear. Wanted a shoe that I would not want to tear off my feet the moment I walked through the door. These fit the bill.
customer_reviews.author: The Mad Shoptress

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I was told to get a 1/2 size smaller due to stretching. I did. Must wear socks with them until they stretch but they are super comfortable and I wore them all day. Taking them on a trip to Costa Rica and wanted something light a quick drying.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca S

customer_reviews.title: Just a smidge bigger than expected
customer_reviews.text: I have been a size 10 womens since i was 15. Standard 9.5s never fit. So i ordered a 10 and it fits well but loose. it's hard to push my toes into the rubber toe area, but that may be due to the height of the bridge material. Also, the Barberry color is a brilliant fuchsia whereas i was hoping for a red. Oh well. Wore it all day to the dog park, in and out of the water, dirt, bark, grass and sand. Not a single blister. Dirt occasionally gets stuck under your toes and you can't kick it out but otherwise, this is the best athletic shoe i've ever purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Fireflyhaven

customer_reviews.title: They are really nice but the pictures on that website are off in ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these in the sterling blue. They are really nice but the pictures on that website are off in color. The bottoms are actually a dark blue not black. Not a deal breaker for me, but I would have rathered black instead. Fit perfectly, much better than the Keen Newport.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Radiant red = Bright flower pink
customer_reviews.text: Ok. They're keens- they are more comfortable a half size up generally and are amazingly comfortable. The anatomical footbed is awesome! Purchased the radiant red because these are cabin shoes and I don't really care too much about color and do wear a fair amount of red. They are not red- they are a bright almost hot pink but more like some sort of flower- I think a red azalea maybe. A very cool color- just not quite what I expected. Not the color if you want to be wearing candy apple or any university red and match but a great fun summer shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Traci Kane Anderson

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THE SANDAL, BE AWARE THEY RUN SMALL!!
customer_reviews.text: I just received the Keen Women's Whisper Water Shoe in Purple Heart Raya,8.5M US and they are too small, which is a shame because I love the shoe I couldn't wait to wear them. I own a pair of Keen's in a 8.5 and they fit like they were made for me, so I assumed same brand and similar shoe they would fit. I would suggest ordering a 1/2 size up, which I am going to do to replace the pair I got. Fortunately for me my sister loved them, she's normally a size 8, and bought from me!! I will be ordering a replacement soon in a 9!
customer_reviews.author: Aunt Ki Ki

customer_reviews.title: these shoes are comfortable right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Wow, these shoes are comfortable right out of the box. Be warned: you do NOT need to buy up a half size. I read all the reviews, people complained about the shoe sizing being too small, so I cautiously ordered a half size larger. That was a mistake, a half size larger fit was way too long. Just stick with your normal size, you'll be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy Swank

customer_reviews.title: I love the Keen Whispers
customer_reviews.text: I love the Keen Whispers! This is my 4th pair! I wear my Keens to work everyday, I am a teacher so I’m on my feet all day, and they haven’t let me down yet. They have great arch support, and they protect my toes when the little ones step on them. My goal is to have a pair in every color 😉
customer_reviews.author: Amy Gaylord

customer_reviews.title: I have narrow feet and somebody recommended these since they are narrower than other Keen models
customer_reviews.text: I have narrow feet and somebody recommended these since they are narrower than other Keen models. I bought a pair about 3 years ago and absolutely love them. Although they are holding up fine, I thought I should get a backup pair in different color. The new pair feels stiffer than the original, hopefully they relax. I normally wear 8.5 but 9 fits perfectly. I got the Neutral Gray/Ink Blue. The blue is more like dark teal.
customer_reviews.author: Saly

customer_reviews.title: I bought these sandals for my Fiancée who loves them ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these sandals for my Fiancée who loves them. She has a pair that is 3 years old in a different color and wanted a new pair. They are a little pricey but for as long as they hold up, they are worth the money. They are well made and she wears them all day long in the summer. She has worn them boating, canoing, and light hiking as well as for everyday wear. Now I'm looking for a pair of similar men's keen sandals for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: The Price was Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a pair of Keen's for many years, but couldn't justify the sandal for over $100 dollars, these keens are cool and affordable! I'm so glad I now have a pair to sport around in :)
customer_reviews.author: LKAY

customer_reviews.title: These run a bit small so order a size up
customer_reviews.text: I have been a fan of Keen for my kids' shoes and finally decided to buy a pair for me. These are made really well and I think they would be extremely comfortable if it wasn't for the fact that they run a little on the small side. I wear an 8.5/9m so I went with a size 9. When I tried these on I realized I really should have ordered at 9.5. The heel of my foot is on the very edge of the show so after walking for a bit my heel really starts to bother me. Aside from the size issue, I do still believe these are great shoes and great quality.
customer_reviews.author: jessica aguilar

customer_reviews.title: Not durable at all
customer_reviews.text: The sole came off in about half a year of usage without any trashing at terrain. Purely flat pavement walking and a little disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for Hawaii vacation
customer_reviews.text: Used my Keen shoes to hike to waterfalls, go kayaking, on zodiac boat putting, etc. These shoes are perfect for water sports however I did read a review where the traction could have been better and after hiking to the waterfalls I would have to agree the traction could be better on wet rocks and mud (I did slip a bit on those types of terrain). The shoes are ultra comfy and provide some toe protection so I used them when riding ATV's. These shoes are the all around perfect active foot ware for warm weather.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne M. Carr

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of these I’ve owned. I love them. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Hall

customer_reviews.title: KEEN Whisper - best water
customer_reviews.text: These are the best water shoes I have ever had. Use primarily for kayaking, and the heel grips for the sit; dries quickly; comfortable all day. Have also worn these walking all day in D.C. - they were comfortable (even for high arches), kept my feet cool, looked amazing, and performed far better than the one pair of actual walking shoes that I own.
customer_reviews.author: Scottiedog

customer_reviews.title: Versatile
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a river/camping weekend and they worked amazing. It was so nice being able to go in the water and then go hiking. They dry quickly and can be adjusted to fit snug. They have good traction too. Highly recommend if you are looking for a good outdoor/woods/water shoe for summer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good support, and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to replace an older Keen sandal that I could not find anywhere. This fit as expected , good support, and comfortable. The only reason I gave these 4 stars instead of 5 is because I wanted same style as I had before, which is closed back, slightly higher arch. If I still had my other pair or could find this would be 5. I use these hiking or working outside when boots are just too hot- summer in Georgia!. in those situations you really do not want open back. By the way my first pair were almost 10 years old, they last long time and would not be replacing if I had not lost one shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Bonni from Atlanta

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Love the ease of ordering these online when I needed them!! Great shoes for any beach trip!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are the best!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. I've had them for one day and so far so good. I wore ankle socks which helped because my feet are sensitive (RA - hammer toes!) but you couldn't tell I had them on.
customer_reviews.author: MARILYN WOODS

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful if they fit!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color, a nice deep berry red (beet/honeysuckle) ! Sadly it didn't fit me! I usually wear a 9N, or a medium that runs narrow. Tried a 9 in these first, it was too short, but the width was good., so I exchanged for 9.5 and it was sloppy on my foot, too wide and all over too large. It does seem to run 1/2 size too short. Keens are usually too wide for me, but after reading the other reviews I thought maybe these would fit . They seem well made, are very lightweight , beautiful color choices, great amazon price and waterproof., just not the right fit for me.
customer_reviews.author: gypsy

customer_reviews.title: Yummie Color
customer_reviews.text: KEEN has changed the foot bed of this years Whisper........I don't know about their other styles. however. It seems broader across the ball of the foot. I have found this to be true with the several pairs I have ordered and had to send back. Therefore if you have a wider foot, these should work fine. B and above. These will last for ever and the colors do not appear to fade provided you don't leave them in the sun for protracted periods of time. I have 5 pair and the colors are great.
customer_reviews.author: C in Yakima

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I have a tough time with shoes (wide feet with issues) and these are awesome! Very lightweight and comfy, yet durable for hiking. You can tighten or loosen them for a perfect fit. And they look nice!
customer_reviews.author: helenp

customer_reviews.title: Ideal water shoes
customer_reviews.text: My favorite kayaking and water sports shoe. Fairly thick sole keeps out most pebbles. Elastic cords make personal adjustments to foot easy. After launching the kayak through mud, I just get into the kayak, and dunk my feet into the water before putting legs into kayak. Rinses out easily. Afterwards, I hose off these shoes and let them dry outside.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Love theae shoes! I wore them right out of the box and they were great for walking, hiking and a trip to Disney with my chilren. They are the lightest weight od the Keen sandals and yet still provide good support. I definitely went a half size up from my regular 9 size. The whisper comes in lots of nice colors and these neutral gray ones go with just about everything. A VERY comfy sandal.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Benson

customer_reviews.title: I like. I have 4 other keen sandals
customer_reviews.text: Color is great, I have many keen sand I love them all. Comfortable, supportive, I've been wearing keeps for last 10 years and I highly recommend them. The town I live in has no one who carries them, so I always was shoe shopping when I went to larger town on vacation. Now I get to shop from home, size is always universal, if you want comfortable buy them.
customer_reviews.author: margaret yvonne poole

customer_reviews.title: Amazing comfort and fit
customer_reviews.text: I used to buy a new pair of cheap sandal for each summer. At the end of season, I would throw it away because it would fall apart or I couldn't bear to wear something so uncomfortable. I received this pair as a birthday gift. It fits amazingly and it is extremely comfortable. I am confident that this sandal will last several years. When this sandal does worn out eventually, I am sure I'll buy another sandal by KEEN.
customer_reviews.author: Student Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the shoe. The color is exactly as it shows here and the Keen brand is well known for support and comfort. I bought the shoes for walking and hiking. And they are very comfortable. The fit is perfect, but I admit that I tried a pair on in a local store so I was sure to order the correct size. They came quickly and were the best price I could find for this high quality shoe. I just hope the weather starts to improve here so that I get to wear them more often!
customer_reviews.author: Susan E. Manrodt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect travel shoe
customer_reviews.text: These fit so comfortably right out of the box, and for me the sizing was accurate- I normally wear between a 7.5 and 8, and the 7.5 fit perfectly (however my feet are on the narrow side; also, they do loosen a bit after wearing them a few times). I wore them for 10 days straight while traveling in Peru, and they were the only pair of shoes I needed. (I chose the Black gargoyle color, and I'm really glad- they matched everything and don't stand out too much)
customer_reviews.author: JLainMich

customer_reviews.title: All around great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to hike the Narrows in Zion up the virgin river. Great traction and stability through rushing water and slippery river rocks. We hiked for 6 hours, no pain in my feet, no blisters, no sore spots. Amazing! Came home and have been wearing them out and about for errands and so on. They are cool, unbelievably comfortable, and I think they are super cute! Just as a comparison, I tried on the H2 and the whisper. I have narrow feet, so the whisper fits perfectly for me, while the H2 was way to wide. My best friend has short, wider feet, and she loves the H2. I found the whisper to be true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Clancy

customer_reviews.title: ... walked on it for miles yet but seems very comfortable. This runs just a hair short
customer_reviews.text: Haven't walked on it for miles yet but seems very comfortable. This runs just a hair short. With the toe being closed in I think I would order 1/2 size larger if you are at the max in your size. Seriously cute on. Good water shoe. You will not stub your toe because of the closed rubber on the toe. Great for camping, river rafting, whatever you do in the water. Like them so far. This is my first pair of KEEN shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Tommi P

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: These are GREAT outdoor sandals whether you're hiking, fishing, camping, or just enjoying the outdoors. They are SO comfortable you'll forget they are on. They are also adjustable to your liking. Can't think of anything about them I'd change except they are a little pricey...but worth it. I really like this color too, but them come in many colors. Good job Keen.
customer_reviews.author: Conrgrl

customer_reviews.title: Happy Feet!
customer_reviews.text: Lovely blue color. Plan to not wear closed shoes this summer, so I just ordered my second pair this season to go with other outfits. I have wide feet, but these fit great. The Keens I have from 3 years ago still fit and feel good. So comfortable! Reasonably priced. Happy!!
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Loved my first two pairs so much that I purchased a Third Pair!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the third pair of Keen's Whisper Sandals that I have purchased thru Amazon. Loved my first and second pair so much that I purchased another color. I usually wear a 7.5 in regular closed in shoes and, but my other two pairs were 8, so I re-ordered a size 8. They are very comfortable and you don't have to worry if they get wet. The shoe is very supportive and I got my third pair yesterday and wore them immediately out in the pouring rain. So, already enjoying them!!!!
customer_reviews.author: C F Barbour

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Love these Keens! Have been looking for years and finally found a style I love. Because of the light color I should have sprayed them first but I clean when I’ve been hiking or fishing in a dirtier area.
customer_reviews.author: SAB

customer_reviews.title: Love them! This is my 2nd pair
customer_reviews.text: Love them! This is my 2nd pair. Decided to wear these with my wedding dress instead of traditional wedding shoes. Getting married on a ferry & my future husband & I kayak often. Can't wait to see his face when he sees me on our big day! Plus, we will both get to think about our day every time I wear these shoes again during our kayak adventures, which I'm sure will be often. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Boyd

customer_reviews.title: sending shoes back.
customer_reviews.text: Shoes- the wide was too wide in the heel & my usual size was too short. I’ll be returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: They fit perfectly and this is the first Keen I have been able to wear. I have a narrow foot and the others are too wide and large. This shoe is made for a more narrow foot. Good support for anything, walking, hiking. They are really cute too! I got them too late in the season to wear much now but they will be a staple next spring and summer. I will most likely get another pair in another color they are so pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Infiniti Lover

customer_reviews.title: Needed a Larger Size
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 other pairs of Keens in Leather - I love Keens!!! I needed a pair of water shoes for an upcoming Amazon River trip. I usually wear a 9, but for me these ran small. My heal hung over the back. I had to return them for a 10 which fit perfectly. Also, other reviewers claim they were tight around the toes. I did not notice this in either size. You just can't beat Keens for comfort! And you can't beat Amazon for speedy delivery!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Sweet

customer_reviews.title: Favorite outdoor shoes
customer_reviews.text: I have two pairs of these and I love them. I wear them almost everyday in my activities, whether it is yard work, walking the dogs, going to the beach, light hiking, errands, etc. I love the color choices, and might buy yet another pair! The only thing is, I get a funny tan on my feet through the cutouts in the shoe!! Not a problem, just think it looks funny when I am barefoot. These shoes are comfortable and give good support and don't slip when I am climbing on rocks at the beach. I hope they never stop making this style.
customer_reviews.author: susan woolley

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I have another pair of keen sandals and they are of better quality than these. I liked them anyway. They are lighter and fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Ana de la Plaza

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I order a new pair every year or so and demote the well-worn ones to water shoes. I wear them everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Mamomi

customer_reviews.title: Normal fit
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear 8 1/2 medium to wide and got these in 8 1/2, and they are very comfortable I ordered my first pair of Whispers in 9. The 9s have extra room but they do not rub because I can tighten them. (It looks like some Keen shoes are not as flexible.)
customer_reviews.author: Beth M

customer_reviews.title: They were comfortable from the moment I put them on
customer_reviews.text: This is my first pair of hiking shoes. I purchased them based on the reviews and the recommendation of a friend who does a lot of serious hiking. The reviews are correct; they do run about 1/2 size small and there is no "break in" needed. I normally wear a size 9, so I ordered a 9 1/2 and using the straps to adjust, they fit perfectly. They were comfortable from the moment I put them on. I wore them walking and hiking all day for 3 days and they were fantastic. I'm sure this will not be my last pair of Keens.
customer_reviews.author: Debra S.

customer_reviews.title: Whatcha for RETURN WINDOW !!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the size I always wear and the 8.5 was too big. I wanted to return them when I got back to town, but the RETURN WINDOW had just closed!! I’m sure the shoes would be excellent for a person with a bigger foot who likes to hike a lot.
customer_reviews.author: DF

customer_reviews.title: Nope.
customer_reviews.text: No matter how tight they are adjusted foot slips back. I think the heel strap is set too far back cause heel to hang over the back of the shoe. I tried 2 sizes with no luck. Never experienced a problem like this with Keens before. Bad design.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne

customer_reviews.title: Keen makes great products
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite sandals. I work outside and I'm on me feet all day. These keen sandals hold up. I put miles on them. This is my third pair. I've tried other knock off brands. They don't hold up. I'm definitely a believer in keens products!
customer_reviews.author: Kara Marotta

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are wonderful - I wear them at the beach
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are wonderful - I wear them at the beach, around camp and camp showers, biking and yard work. They go on and off easily, but stay on comfortably. They clean well, dry quickly and maintain their color - no stains despite exposure to lots of mud. I don't recommend them for extended walking on hard pavement. When I did, I had some pain later in the day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: KEEN SANDAlS always good fit
customer_reviews.text: Keen sandals are the only ones I buy. I know when I order my size 9 1/2, they will always fit. Now that I know Amazon carries them, it is even better
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Summer ready
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, very comfortable I'm glad I bought them in another color as well
customer_reviews.author: michele jenkins

customer_reviews.title: SIZE DOWN, not up!
customer_reviews.text: So many people here say to size up, but we found it to be quite the opposite. These shoes are HUGE clown shoes! My daughter normally takes a 9, so based on all these reviews telling us to size up we ordered a 9.5. They are gigantic! So we are exchanging them for an 8.5. Cute shoes, though, just trouble with the sizing.
customer_reviews.author: A.

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoe! I have tried so many different pairs of shoes and can't get the same comfort I get in these shoes. I already own one pair so I know how comfortable they are.
customer_reviews.author: Tresa Whitehead

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes for hiking!
customer_reviews.text: My friend had me buy her these on my account and she wore them on our weekend hiking trip. She loved them and said how comfortable they were and she even wore them on our 20 mile hike the one day and didn't complain once. She said they were amazing! :)
customer_reviews.author: David J.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect summer sandle
customer_reviews.text: The moment you slip your foot into this shoe...you know you've got a winner
customer_reviews.author: Never too old to learn

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite pair of KEEN's
customer_reviews.text: I have loved every pair of Keen's that I have purchased-----EXCEPT THESE. My feet get extremely hot and tend to swell in this pair. I have even loosened the string! I don't have any trouble with swelling in any other pair of shoes I own. Maybe I will try these in the cooler weather and hopefully that will help. I do like the color very much.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: keen women's sandle
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with these sandals. I only gave it a 4 because I have really high arches & they don't seem quite high enough for me. I have a hard time buying sandals that work for me. The great thing about these is that I can put arch supports in them & they will stay. If you have really high arches, you might consider that. These will be great for playing outside with the kids this summer & a trip to the zoo & sea world.
customer_reviews.author: Coley Burgess

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! I have them in two colors and they are my new favorite summer shoes. Comfortable enough to wear all day. One warning though - I tend to have wide feet and they are perfect for me. If you have a narrow foot they may slip around on you. They DO have an adjustable strap however.
customer_reviews.author: S. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Color get dirty fast
customer_reviews.text: Item is hard to put on and hard to get a good fit. Rubs the side of my toes and my foot slips around. Also, the color changes and after one kayak trip it looks dingy and almost a pinkish-purple after using just once in salt water.
customer_reviews.author: amy m

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes, but bigger than expected
customer_reviews.text: I really like these so far and have found that they're great for light exercise and walking (the only exercise I've done in them so far). I ordered my regular shoe size and find that they're actually a bit big on me, but not so big that they're uncomfortable. Perhaps they will fit better if I wear them for longer periods of time and my feet swell or something. Overall, a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie M.

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Wore these on and off for two weeks traveling around Cuba without breaking them in first and were comfortable the whole time. My bf purchased a less expensive water shoe (same type) for the trip and his was already falling apart half way through. My feet did get a little stinky in the heat and humidity all day, but all in all a great shoe I expect will last for years.
customer_reviews.author: VK

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Got these today. Usually wear 9.5-10. Got a 10 and they fit perfectly. I have a wide foot and no complaints!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Really like the shoe but
customer_reviews.text: I am no longer convinced that one should buy it a half size larger. I am usually a 9.5 so ordered these in 10 and they are HUGE. Try them on first and don't make the same mistake. Other than that, they are quite wonderful...comfortable, quick to dry, just what you would expect from Keen.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Pfeiffer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are comfortable and also sturdy without looking old fashioned. They are also easy to clean. I hope Keen will add more style options in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Cote

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Comfort & Traction
customer_reviews.text: The sandals are extremely comfortable and light. In addition they are very durable and pretty much all I wear all summer long. I even receive compliments on how they look. Good traction, wet or dry (I have worn them on a wet plastic dock), flexible, easy to tighten or loosen...what more could I want?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you have wide feet these are not for you
customer_reviews.text: These are great shoes. I purchased them to replace the ones I have that are on their last gasp. The new ones are narrow by a large amount and do not fit my wide feet...and the old ones were perfect. I sent them back
customer_reviews.author: C. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Love keen sandals
customer_reviews.text: They are comfortable and my feet are wide it will take wearing them a few times to stretch them out
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are SOOOO much better than the imposters
customer_reviews.text: My first pair of "Keens" were a knock-off from a local big box store. They were OK, but the strap broke after a few years. These shoes prove you get what you pay for. They are SOOOO much better than the imposters. So comfortable, and I love the blue color.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Nickel

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and Beauty!
customer_reviews.text: I've looked at these shoes for two previous seaszons, and decided to finally buy them.. They are extremely comfortable, but just a little small. L love the bright colors, and also the fact that I can wander around in dewy grass with no damage. I would recommend these shoes to anyone who likes them. However, my next pair will be a half size larger.
customer_reviews.author: Donna M. Harsell

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing service!!
customer_reviews.text: The product was exactly as promised and great quality. However, I chose the 3-5 business day option for standard shipping. I expected the product within that amount of time as it was a gift to be given while we were on vacation in upstate NY. The product never came the whole week we were there even though that was what was projected. The product took much longer than expected. The gift came long after we left vacation and my niece never got her gift until after her birthday was over. Really disappointing service. Over promised and under delivered!
customer_reviews.author: kelly roberts

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I wear the shoes for comfort as well as ventilation at work.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Bandy

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had chosen a true blue but I love the quality and fit
customer_reviews.text: Wish I had chosen a true blue but I love the quality and fit. Fit is so good because the heel is pulled in snugly as well as the rest of the sandal when you tighten the elastic strap. Truly excellent product design.
customer_reviews.author: earthmama

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these shoes! They are the first pair of shoes that were very comfortable right out the box. No break in time needed at all. I will definitely order more Keens like these!
customer_reviews.author: Desiree

customer_reviews.title: I love that these sandals are made for water
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of Keen Whisper in the same size. First pair fit perfect--this one is tight over the instep (the top of my foot). I thought they would stretch out, but I've been wearing them about 3 hours at a time every day for about 2 weeks, and they still are tight. The back strap is longer too, and slides down off in the back. My first pair I could wear all day with no discomfort. Not so with these. I love that these sandals are made for water, and I wash them often. Not sure I would buy them again at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Z

customer_reviews.title: very satisfied except the inside straps seems a little rougher than ...
customer_reviews.text: This was my third purchase of Keen sandals. very satisfied except the inside straps seems a little rougher than usual.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Maenza

customer_reviews.title: Good walking shoe
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Only issue is some of the strapping is a bit much but I think they need to be broken in. I wore them all day and did a bit of walking in them and that is what I bought them for. I would recommend this product and I would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would purchase again!
customer_reviews.text: Great sandals...were able to wear them right out of the box with no break in time. Easy off and on with the bungee cord design. The sandals are very light weight, but have good support. These have become my go to shoes....
customer_reviews.author: nomad

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and sporty
customer_reviews.text: I ordered both the 8.5 and 9 after reading reviews. Usually I tend to be a 9. This time the 8.5 was a better fit. My foot moved around too much in the 9 and since I don't plan on wearing socks with them the 8.5 was perfect. My son and husband both own Keens. They are great! And Amazons price cannot be beat!
customer_reviews.author: Diamond8s

product_meta.title: KEEN Women's Whisper Sandal
product_meta.description:
Women's Outdoor Shoe.Approximate weight per shoe: 8.7 oz / 246.6 g

From hidden coves to rushing rivers, the Whisper sandal from KEEN can manage any water-filled day. The quick draw elastic cord lacing system adjusts to a comfortable and secure fit. The washable polyester upper features the odor-reducing Aegis Microbe Shield®. The foot-cushioning EVA molded footbed provides comfort on the go.

 

This airy, lightweight sandal is an all-around adventurer. Elastic cording gives it a secure fit, easy to adjust in or out of the water. The washable upper makes cleaning easy, and the cushioned footbed provides comfort on the go.


- Cleansport NXT™ for natural odor control
- Compression molded EVA midsole
- Hydrophobic mesh lining
- Metatomical EVA footbed
- Multi directional lug pattern for increased traction
- Non-marking rubber outsole
- Secure fit lace capture system
- TPU stability shank
- Washable polyester webbing upper
- Women's specific fit

Fit Tip: Most customers find this style is true to size!

See more
feature_bullets: Made in the USA or Imported
Hydrophobic mesh lining. Non-marking rubber outsole. Compression molded EVA midsole
METATOMICAL FOOTBED DESIGN. This internal support mechanism is anatomically engineered to provide excellent arch support and cradle the natural contours of the foot.
All KEEN water sandals are machine washable. Use a small amount of detergent, wash on gentle cycle and air dry.
